argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvsz.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvsz.6 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` U ) = ( 1st ` U ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_nvvc | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_vafval | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( 1st ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_smfval | |- S = ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( BaseSet ` U ) = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 9 | 8, 5 | #P_bafval | |- ( BaseSet ` U ) = ran ( +v ` U ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 7, 9, 10 | #P_vcz | |- ( ( ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD /\ A e. CC ) -> ( A S ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC ) -> ( A S ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 2 | #P_0vfval | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC ) -> Z = ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC ) -> ( A S Z ) = ( A S ( GId ` ( +v ` U ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 15, 14 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC ) -> ( A S Z ) = Z ) |
